title: Did not receive response from server
body: Ok so I accidentally disabled my wifi, got that all sorted again but went to log in to League and got an instant "did not receive response from server 1, 2, 3" I am 99% sure it has something to do with accidentally disabling the wifi as I played a game the day before. Please help I cant find any good help for this. Have tried a lot of fixes nothing works. Again I am sure it has something to do with disabling the wifi maybe a setting reset or something :s

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you try [switching to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5), let me know if that helps at all.
